Web pages should look good on all devices (desktops, tablets, phones).

## The Viewport Meta Tag
Always include this in your HTML `<head>`:
```html
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
```
It tells the browser to set the width of the page to follow the screen-width of the device.
